author: paperliss
content: I understand that Arbitrum One and other L2s post all their calldata to the L1. Does that mean that deploying an instance of Arbitrum on Arbitrum One would be pointless because all the call data would need to end up on the L1 regardless?

author: albusdompeldorius
content: Correct. You might be interested in this article: https://vitalik.ca/general/2022/09/17/layer_3.html (E.g. under "Why you can't just keep scaling by stacking rollups on top of rollups".
